name: ClaretaLabs
description: Clareta Labs is a leading IT solution pr
overview: Let’s congratulate one of the software companies from the galaxy of software companies which completed 4 years of its successful operation. Its Clareta Labs, which operates from the upcoming IT city of Odisha-Bhubaneswar. Started with handful of developers in 2009 with a single project in hand grew to 50+ odd developers by end of 2012. Various phases of Software development Methodology is minutely tracked, traced with continuous improvements. Not only the Satisfied Clients but also Happy Employees are the real assets of the company. Clareta Now operates from its development center at Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India and sales couple of sales offices in India and to track overseas operations. Its capability matrix stretches out into various technical boundaries and covers multi domain industries to cope the ongoing change of market needs. Clareta takes the opportunity to take the pleasure of adding few colored feathers to its esteemed client base like Vedanta, KHIMJI, Godrej, HPCL and the list goes on.
